main event: Four airmen at Luke AFB observed a round white light traveling in a straight line at approximately 200 mph for 3-4 seconds.
interesting points: The sighting was reported by four airmen, The object was seen to blink on and off, indicating it could be a pilot light on balloons, The sequence of movement was repeated three minutes later, No sound or exhaust was observed from the object, The altitude was estimated at around 17,000 ft during the sighting.
